column4: is there anyone out there that can help me with pinning packages
keep network manager as it is?
so what do i do to install it
you have to extract it first
it is a compressed archive of source code. But before you attempt to compile, make sure if the program is in the repos
so its not in the repos?
i dont know how to check that
i cant seem to find it... ok first you need to extract it
in a terminal, cd to the directory
is there a readme or INSTALL file?
ok.. you dont need to compile
i have to go now so will have to be quick
in terminal, sudo apt-get install openssl
and then sudo apt-get install python-m2crypto
type python anondownload.py  at once in the terminal and press enter
are you still in the terminal? in the directory?
all at the same time. then press enter
now right click desktop and select 'create launcher'
copy and paste exactly as i gave you
now double click on the launcher you just created
in terminal, copy and paste this then : python ~/Desktop/anomos/anomos/anondownloadgui.py
now in same terminal, type sudo apt-get install python-m2crypto
copy and paste exactly as i have given you
now type sudo apt-get install openssl
now copy paste this in terminal and press enter : python ~/Desktop/anomos/anomos/anondownloadgui.py
ok.. now NEVER delete the folder 'anomos' from the desktop, ok?
ok now double click to open it
now copy paste the text from here - http://pastebin.com/4LptRukV
now right click on the file and click 'properties' then click the 'permissions' tab
an put a check in 'allow executing file as program'
now double click on the file
now i have to study this to understand what we did
the program is made using python. to run it, we need to use python.. i just automated it using bash :)
if you need any more help ill be online tomorrow... around 9 hours from now :)
